pageContext.claim: “Based on the information released last night about the Fake Whistleblowers attorney, the Impeachment Hoax should be ended IMMEDIATELY! There is no case, except against the other side!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has drawn attention to a tweet by Mark Zaid, attorney for the whistleblower, on Jan. 30, 2017 which said “#coup has started” and that “#impeachment will follow ultimately.” He tweeted it over a tweet about the firing of Acting Attorney General Sally Yates. Trump suggests that Zaid was threatening a coup. But Zaid said that was not the case: “I was referring to a completely lawful process of what President Trump would likely face as a result of stepping over the line, and that particularly whatever would happen would come about as a result of lawyers. The coup comment referred to those working inside the Administration who were already, just a week into office, standing up to him to enforce recognized rules of law.“
